description: Generic block member. All block members are based on this one.
title: Generic block member

role.description: Role of member in the block. Value is unique within the block.

constantOid.description: TRUE if and only if object ID is nonvolatile.

identity.description: Identity of class of which this member is an instance

ports.description: List of this object's bkPorts. Used only when member is a port-flexible object.
